name: Zoe's Live
description:
In Zoe's Live the player takes on the role of Zoe, a teenage girl who loves animals and wants to become an online sensation by sharing her pets with the world. The game is set in Zoe's bedroom, which is filled with clutter and mess.

Controls

mouse : Drag

Right & Left keyboard: move around room

Objective

Help Zoe find her adorable animals before the battery runs out. However, the player must also be careful of her little brother's creepy animals, as showcasing them will cause her viewers to lose interest quickly

Zoe's Live is fun and engaging game that combines elements of hidden object games and time management games
